headline: New Year’s Day 2026: What’s open & what’s closed?
summary: Millions of Americans will be celebrating New Year’s Day, a major U.S. holiday, marking the start of 2026, which falls on Thursday, January 1. Here’s what’s open and closed on New Year’s Day 2026. New Year’s Day is a national holiday, but some businesses will remain open. Companies that sell ...

headline: Kroger, Macy's and more closing hundreds of stores in 2026
summary: Some records are better left unbroken. Nobody wants the record for most times left at the altar, or to put it into 2025 terms, no worker wants to wear the crown of "person laid off the most in the past year." In retail, however, a bleak 2024 set the table for an even darker 2025. Following a spike ...
